languages.text: {n}Рык Глейто становится чуть бодрее и увереннее. Чем больше агрессии вы проявлете, тем больше крепнет его готовность оставить вас без головы.{/n}
{n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рык Глейто становится чуть бодрее и увереннее. Чем больше агрессии вы проявлете, тем больше крепнет его готовность оставить вас без головы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}
{n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}
{n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}
{n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}
{n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaitos Knurren wird etwas munterer und selbstbewusster. Je aggressiver du dich verhältst, desto entschlossener ist er, dir den Kopf abzubeißen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaitos Knurren wird etwas munterer und selbstbewusster. Je aggressiver du dich verhältst, desto entschlossener ist er, dir den Kopf abzubeißen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le grognement de Glaito se fait un peu plus fougueux et assuré. Si vous continuez à vous montrer {mf|agressif|agressive}, vous aurez toutes les chances de finir {mf|décapité|décapitée}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le grognement de Glaito se fait un peu plus fougueux et assuré. Si vous continuez à vous montrer {mf|agressif|agressive}, vous aurez toutes les chances de finir {mf|décapité|décapitée}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}グライトの唸り声に、ほんの少し活気と自信が戻ってきた。あなたが攻撃的になればなるほど、彼はあなたの首を吹き飛ばす覚悟を強めていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトの唸り声に、ほんの少し活気と自信が戻ってきた。あなたが攻撃的になればなるほど、彼はあなたの首を吹き飛ばす覚悟を強めていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El gruñido de Glaito se vuelve más confiado y vivaz. Cuanta más agresión muestras, más dispuesto está a dejarte sin cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El gruñido de Glaito se vuelve más confiado y vivaz. Cuanta más agresión muestras, más dispuesto está a dejarte sin cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托的咆哮变得更加响亮有力。你表现得越是充满攻击性，它就越可能一口把你的脑袋咬下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托的咆哮变得更加响亮有力。你表现得越是充满攻击性，它就越可能一口把你的脑袋咬下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito, heyecan ve öz güvenle hırıldamaya devam ediyor. Sen saldırganlaştıkça o da kafanı koparmaya daha bir hevesleniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's growl becomes a little more spirited and confident. The more aggression you show, the readier he is to leave you without a head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito, heyecan ve öz güvenle hırıldamaya devam ediyor. Sen saldırganlaştıkça o da kafanı koparmak için daha çok hevesleniyor.{/n}
